These are basically NPC replacers. The NPCs replaced are the non relevant patrons of The Drunken Bee tavern in Riverville. In order to make them into followers they must be force recruited by u
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Geralt and Friends in Enderal 

[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FdzARFN.jpg[/img] 


[youtube]nXFNh49kQ2k[/youtube] 


[size=3]Managed to place The Witcher cast in Enderal using popular nexus follower mods  Geralt, Ciri, Triss and Yennefer. This is experimental but it basically works. These are just PATCHES. Original Follower mods are REQUIRED. These are basically NPC replacers. The NPCs replaced are the non-relevant patrons of The Drunken Bee tavern in Riverville. In order to make them into followers they must be force-recruited by using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/]Extensible Follower Framework mod[/url]. The NPCs will use regular Skyrim, non-Enderal apparel mods (a lot are available here on Nexus so choose some & acquire the gear via console or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu[/url].)

[/size][size=3]NOTICE: Do not use these NPCs along with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80400/?]Sofia and Friends in Enderal[/url] NPCs as they will conflict, most especially Sofia & Ciri. 

[/size]*As mentioned: All NPCs are located inside The Drunken Bee tavern in Riverville.[size=3]*Again, the mods I did are just PATCHES. ORIGINAL follower mods are REQUIRED.
*Don't expect the NPCs to have their usual follower features like: extensive dialogue or relationship rankings, as they will rely on Enderal's & EFF's limits.[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71730/?]Geralt Of Rivia Voiced Follower The Witcher by imAarwyn[/url] 
- Geralt replaces one of the generic patrons. He retains his custom voice but must be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68567/?]Cirilla (Ciri) Fiona Elen Riannon - Witcher 3 Voiced Follower by Levionte[/url]
[/size][size=3]
- Ciri replaces one of the generic patrons. She retains her custom voice but must be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69893/?]Triss Merigold The Witcher Voiced Standalone Follower CBBE by imAarwyn[/url]
- Triss replaces one of the Drunken Bee's patrons. She retains the patron's voice & habits (Sorry, no custom voice.) She can be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it. *Triss by default has a HDT body.

[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69939/?]Yennefer of Vengerberg - The Witcher 3 Voiced Standalone Follower by Levionte[/url][size=3]- Yennefer replaces one of the Drunken Bee's patrons. She retains the patron's voice & habits (Sorry, no custom voice.) She can be recruited by using EFF. Install the main mod first then install the patch after it.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]*Recommend to install non-HDT bodies on NPCs, like basic UNP or CBBE.
[/size][size=3]*Although demo depicts Emily /Babydoll & Recorder to be included as direct edit of the main plugin worked, replicating a patch didn't. I apologize for this. [/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Credits: 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71730/?]Geralt Of Rivia Voiced Follower The Witcher by imAarwyn[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68567/?]Cirilla (Ciri) Fiona Elen Riannon - Witcher 3 Voiced Follower by Levionte[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69893/?]Triss Merigold The Witcher Voiced Standalone Follower CBBE by imAarwyn[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69939/?]Yennefer of Vengerberg - The Witcher 3 Voiced Standalone Follower by Levionte[/url] 


[/size]
author: AerysTMD
